node.contents: i got this rollbackexception during inserting an entity to db with persist() method.....what is the reason behind this exception?

node.contents: Check that you have set all bi-directional relationships (between your com.model.Product entity and other entities related to it) correctly.

astNode.text: Check that you have set all bi-directional relationships (between your com.model.Product entity and other entities related to it) correctly.

node.contents: For example, if there was a Many-1 relationship from Product to Manufacturer you would have something like:

astNode.text: For example, if there was a Many-1 relationship from Product to Manufacturer you would have something like:

elements.contents: Product product = new Product(); product.setId(1); Manufacturer manufacturer = new Manufacturer (); manufacturer.setId(123); product.setManufacturer(manufacturer); // set Many-1 side of relationship Set<Product> products = new HashSet<Product>(); products.add(product); manufacturer.setProducts(products); // set 1-Many side of relationship

comments.text: // set Many-1 side of relationship Set<Product> products = new HashSet<Product>(); products.add(product); manufacturer.setProducts(products); // set 1-Many side of relationship
